cards.title: Modulus and Absolute Value
details: Interpret and use the modulus function |x| in equations and inequalities
Sketch graphs involving modulus functions y = |ax + b|
Solve equations and inequalities involving modulus

cards.title: Polynomials and Factor Theorems
details: Divide polynomials by linear or quadratic expressions
Apply the factor and remainder theorems to find roots or unknown coefficients

cards.title: Partial Fractions
details: Express rational functions as partial fractions where appropriate
Decompose into linear, repeated, and irreducible quadratic factors

cards.title: Binomial Series
details: Expand (1 + x)^n for any rational n (|x| < 1)
Apply the binomial series to related algebraic expressions
Determine the range of validity for binomial expansions

cards.title: Properties and Laws of Logarithms
details: Understand logarithms and their properties, including laws of logarithms
Solve equations and inequalities involving logarithms and indices

cards.title: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations
details: Use the properties and graphs of exponential and logarithmic functions
Transform relationships to linear form for analysis

cards.title: Trigonometric Functions and Graphs
details: Work with all six trigonometric functions and their graphs
Understand relationships between secant, cosecant, cotangent and the basic functions

cards.title: Trigonometric Identities and Equations
details: Use compound angle, double angle, and related identities for simplification and solution
Express linear combinations such as a sin θ + b cos θ in standard forms
Solve trigonometric equations using appropriate identities

cards.title: Advanced Differentiation Techniques
details: Differentiate composite, product, and quotient functions
Differentiate functions involving ex, ln x, sin x, cos x, tan x, tan^(-1)x

cards.title: Parametric and Implicit Differentiation
details: Find derivatives for functions defined parametrically or implicitly
Apply differentiation to tangents and normals in parametric or implicit contexts

cards.title: Advanced Integration Techniques
details: Integrate eax+b, 1/(ax+b), sin(ax+b), cos(ax+b), sec^2(ax+b), and 1/(a^2 + x^2)
Apply trigonometric identities in integration

cards.title: Partial Fractions and Special Methods
details: Integrate rational functions using partial fraction decomposition
Recognise and integrate functions using the substitution and by parts methods

cards.title: Numerical Methods for Roots
details: Locate roots of equations graphically and by sign change
Understand and use iterative methods to approximate roots

cards.title: Vector Basics and Operations
details: Use standard notation for 2D and 3D vectors
Add, subtract and scale vectors, interpret geometrically

cards.title: Vector Equations and Applications
details: Find equations of lines in vector form
Determine intersection, parallelism, or skewness of lines
Calculate scalar products and apply to geometric problems

cards.title: First Order Differential Equations
details: Formulate and solve simple first order separable differential equations
Use initial conditions to find particular solutions
Interpret solutions in modelling contexts

cards.title: Algebra and Geometry of Complex Numbers
details: Understand and perform operations with complex numbers in Cartesian and polar forms
Find modulus, argument, conjugate, and represent on Argand diagrams

cards.title: Applications and Loci in the Argand Plane
details: Apply algebraic properties such as conjugate root theorem
Multiply and divide in polar form, find square roots
Describe loci defined by modulus or argument conditions
